why: IELTS stands for English Language test for study, migration, and work. Bypassing the IELTS exams with a good band, you can study at top-ranking Colleges and Universities in Canada, Australia, New Zealand, The United Kingdom, and The United States of America.
requirements: The candidate must be at least 16 years of age
types: IELTS Academic to enroll in a Country where most communication is in English
IELTS General training for those going for work- or work-related migration and movement in English-speaking countries.

examCenters.name: Paper-based Test
examCenters.centers: Kathmandu, Pokhara, Chitwan, Butwal, Birtamod, and Biratnagar

examFees.name: IELTS for UK Visa and immigration
IELTS life skills A1 and B1
